quote: The best error message is the one that never shows up.
description: Good software design and thorough testing can prevent many errors from occurring in the first place.

quote: Programming is the art of telling another human what one wants the computer to do.
description: Coding is not just about writing instructions for machines; it's about clear communication and problem-solving.

quote: The only way to do great work is to love what you do.
description: Passion for your work drives innovation and creativity, leading to remarkable outcomes.

quote: In software, we rarely have meaningful requirements. Even if we do, the only measure of success that matters is whether our solution solves the customerâ€™s shifting idea of what their problem is.
description: Agile development acknowledges that software requirements often change, emphasizing the importance of delivering value to the customer.

quote: Code never lies, comments sometimes do.
description: Well-written and self-explanatory code can be more reliable than comments, which might become outdated.
